content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
with a as(
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'DELTA'
    ) AS [result] where year=2021 and month=01 --and lpep_dropoff_datetime>lpep_pickup_datetime 
    and payment_type in (1,2)),
b as (
  select payment_type, payment_type_desc from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR='0x0a'
    ) with (jsonContent nvarchar(max))AS [result] cross apply openjson(jsonContent) with (payment_type smallint,payment_type_desc varchar(15))
),
c as (select * from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        --FIELDQUOTE='0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n',
        HEADER_ROW=true
    )  as result
)
select c.borough,count(1) as total_trips,sum(case when payment_type_desc='Cash' then 1 else 0 end) as cash_trips,
sum(case when payment_type_desc='Credit card' then 1 else 0 end) as card_trips,
cast(sum(case when payment_type_desc='Cash' then 1 else 0 end)/cast(count(1) as decimal) *100 as decimal(5,2)) as cash_trip_percentage,
(sum(case when payment_type_desc='Credit card' then 1 else 0 end)/count(1))*100 as card_trip_percentage
--a.*,b.payment_type_desc
  from a join b on a.payment_type=b.payment_type join c on a.PULocationID=c.LocationID group by c.borough
